posts.post_content:
I have the following graded T206 common cards for sale. Mostly SGC with a couple PSA cards thrown in for good luck.  Backs are 98% Piedmont or Sweet Caporal. All prices include shipping! Check, money order, or paypal are okay. Thanks for looking! Here are the pics:

[url]http://www.flickr.com/photos/iggy-man/sets/72157622838452955/detail/[/url]

I also have for sale......
T206 Evers PSA 2 ($85) 
***SOLD***E96 Myers SGC 20 ($70) ***SOLD***


T206 Evers (Chicago with bat) PSA 2............................$85
Nice card with a spot of paper loss on the upper right corner as well as on the back.  At first glance it does not appear to have a crease, but does display a very faint horizontal hairline above his right elbow (right on the sleeve).  It actually is more visible on the pic then it is in person.

Disregard the email that I sent you. I see that all the cards are sold. I've always enjoyed buying from you, so maybe next time.

Take Care,

Jantz
